comments: Nice game but the way they select the game players within the same "strenght" is unfair. Because they use infamy to measure your lv but at the same time you can get infamy even when you die in the first seconds of a match. In that way you are obligated to face strong enemies because your team is good enought to win the battle without you. In that case the game delievers a bad experience for the player.

Plz push an update to hide chat button during battles, while battle the screen should be much cleaner with minimum icons on screen or transparent eg weapon icon. Auto on off header which shows ship names icons etc to enjoy the game screen on mobile.  Ship score is added but how know the quality / grade /% over the other strong ships where do our ships stand on that point of the certain ship levels.   Sea texture and colour need to be more improved, i really love the water in the poke'go. The way it appers its great. Plz add weather effects lightings nights Strom snowy etc head lights to ships, Reload animations, ship colour paint jobs decals,

Could you fix the guild rivalry page. After battles when people go to check the quests etc. it does not pull up. Have to exit game and restart. Happens a lot and gets frustrating. Other than that it's a very good game
Good changes, but could you guys bring back the big ol' red BATTLE button? The new one doesn't quite evoke that same 'YAAAARRGH!' feeling of going into battle. Thanks:)

Bear with me here.  How about introducing a pulse that stuns? A yellow item, radius 5, 1 slot point and stun duration probably shorter than the Tesla stun in the respective training level.  OR!  have the fixers pulse gain the ability (training maybe) to stun enemies for like 1-2sec. Same duration as when a Tesla shield is forcefully taken down. (not so sure about the second one, but the first seems good)

I love this game and the fact that all the pictures of the game above aren't hyped up. They are the real game. The game is good and I love being able to select my weapons I'm still figuring the system out completely but it's great overall. The only thing I might ask for is a slightly better tutorial
description: Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.Mobile MOBAThe thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus. Choose A ShipChoose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!Weapons, Armor, Items, AbilitiesCannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.Get StrategicAttack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.Join a GuildTeam up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyThis game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. descriptionHTML:
Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.

A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.

Mobile MOBA
The thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus.

Choose A Ship
Choose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!

Weapons, Armor, Items, Abilities
Cannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.

Get Strategic
Attack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.

Join a Guild
Team up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?

description: Christmas is on the way! New Xmas version is released! Join the snowy Musou World with your Friends!“Musou Glory” is a MMOARPG mobile game, a perfect blend of classic role-playing and the new open world gameplay, which create a massive storyline, expressed with visually stunning graphic! Brave the world with alliance, or even meet the love of your life in the world of “Musou Glory”!Game Features:- Unique GameplayThe game has revolutionary gameplay with new elements, new system, and new battle modes. Enjoy “Musou Glory” with the stunning visual and exhilarating gameplay!- Epic Dungeon Crawling GameplayThe game development team has carefully collected the opinions from world renowned game reviewers and thousands of gamers. They have worked hard to craft the dungeon crawling system which specialized in the multiplayer element. descriptionHTML:
Christmas is on the way! New Xmas version is released! Join the snowy Musou World with your Friends!

“Musou Glory” is a MMOARPG mobile game, a perfect blend of classic role-playing and the new open world gameplay, which create a massive storyline, expressed with visually stunning graphic! Brave the world with alliance, or even meet the love of your life in the world of “Musou Glory”!

Game Features:
- Unique Gameplay
The game has revolutionary gameplay with new elements, new system, and new battle modes. It will surely change the way you play ARPG. Enjoy “Musou Glory” with the stunning visual and exhilarating gameplay!

- Epic Dungeon Crawling Gameplay
The game development team has carefully collected the opinions from world renowned game reviewers and thousands of gamers. They have worked hard to craft the dungeon crawling system which specialized in the multiplayer element. The overall game design is an all-rounded one, where hardcore gamers, as well as casual players will find a perfect gaming style that suits them!

- Intriguing PvE and PvP systems
The game consists of numerous PvE and PvP gameplay such as brawl, team battle, clan war, arena, and many more. Be a lone wolf, or a team player while playing the game. Battle freely, anytime, anywhere!

- Lead the trend with fashionable costume
Express yourself with the wide variety of costumes available in the game. There are hundreds of costumes available, ensuring your style to be one of the kind!

Contact Us:

descriptionHTML:
The latest expected AAA Naval-battle game has been online, adding multi-lines fighting to its traditional single-line fighting! The game combines different warships to create its unique naval fleet! As the commander of the fleet, your mission is to strike enemy’s warship and to save your territorial sea! Each fighting is a kind of unique experience!

= Features =

Stablish Your Territory and Ready for action!
You will never know how to do when you have to fight back. Your territory needs to accommodate a strong fleet and you need to protect yourself in naval battle. Establish your territory and update its buildings, which can give you a better protection in PVP and PVE.

The Whole Global Multi-player Online (PVP)!
You are not the only commander with territory! In this game, you need to fight with thousands of commanders to prevent them from destroying your territory. Launch your warship to defend your territory and strike with them to rob their resources!

Unpredictable Brains Battle!
Technology determines its fighting capacity, but the strength comparison will not last eternally.

The Most Exciting Iron Warship!
Steel vessel and Solid cannon are the immortal soul of naval battle! Various aircrafts, battle ships, cruisers, destroyers are waiting silently in the dock and they are waiting for your service.

Research Advanced Technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.

Download Iron Warship:Battle and join the PVP war!

https://www.facebook.com/Iron-WarshipNaval-Battle-509722112564225

comments: I am really disappointed that it takes so much to upgrade each time is insane. I love that there are a few things to help but to have to put so much money into it to be able to do that really makes me not want to play, only a week of that but we get attacked so much that it was all for nothing. I must say Alot of people won't stay if this continues and you won't make as much if you contantly let people down on these little things you could fix. Makes us feel like it's only about the money... it should be fun and enjoyable but that's hard when everything takes so much and so long.... Make the money worth spending.

This game has been glitching for the past 20 hours. can't log in. have reinstalled multiple tjmes. my army will probably have been wiped out by someone who has spent 120,000 dollars on his account (yes there are people who have spent that amount and that's what you're up against) glitch laden game. admins don't give a damn. I will get a standard response to this... if any. Don't download. don't play. don't waste your time and money.

It's a good game but the issue is that much higher level players can attack you regularly. And this sets you back on your development. Level 5 players should not be being attacked by level 20 players. You rebuild an army using resources needed to grow only to have a higher level player destroy it again and again before you can even rebuild completely. My army took a day to rebuild and before I could yluse it it was destroyed again. And more resources are wasted. It is a distressing pattern that has put me off the game.

I love how the game is. Our kingdom 489 have the peace treaty. We dun attack others tagged clan bases. We let them grow. But I currently now facing a problem whereby I can't upload my picture profile. It sucks. Help me and you get ur five stars rating. Get back to me asap. I've been trying for abt a month and nothing change

This game changed my life and how I live... Up until now every so called "strategy game" has been full of nothing but disappointment but then I came across king of Avalon and I was astonished that such a game existed. The graphics are breath taking and the community is truly like your in another world... 5 stars!!!

You will have my 5stars back if you just remove that K.E. in the gold event!!! Or maybe just make it 1 day only!!!  It sucks that all my troops were killed because of that. At least maybe if someone attack a city, not all troops should be lose half of them maybe. How can i gather  resources to heal them if only few left and takes millions or thousands resources to use for healing. Un installed!!! It sucks really!!!
description: Do you play war games? Enjoy free online games? Then prepare yourself! The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! King Arthur’s death has left an empty throne. Raise your dragon and build your army in the quest to lift Excalibur and become the next King of Avalon. In this dragon war, your mighty dragon is the key to ruling your kingdom. Stay alive by forging alliances with your friends and build an empire together. This is a game of kings entangled in a game of war. Who will be victorious in this clash of kings? FEATURES :War! Everywhere. You and your allies need to be prepared for a clash of clans. Build up your bases and bulk up your armies - you're not the only ones with eyes on the throne! Alliances! No man is an island. Whether you’re rallying against a GvE Barbarian leader or marching at a PvP bully, you’ll need allies you can trust. Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train yours? Chat! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in realtime. Strategy! Get the edge through research and master devastating skills. Know when to be invisible and when to order an invasion! Building! Build the foundations of an Empire strong enough to survive in a dragon fire warzone! Epic Fantasy! The Camelot Legend lives. Awesome monsters and HD graphics to drool over. Now play the King of online games, King of Avalon!SUPPORTAre you having problems? https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/king-of-avalon/Privacy Policy: http://www.funplus.com/privacy_policy/Facebook fanpage:https://www.facebook.com/koadwPLEASE NOTE: King of Avalon is completely free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required. Do you have what it takes to become King?

I do miss the old LOA - Fire Raider style of art and play, just came back after maybe a year or so and it was gone! But, Paradise seems pretty cool so far, only thing I'm not a big fan of is how everything deals with irl money while in the 'old' one you could build up gems or materials for certain things like VIP levels; also I heard about rewards being given to old players like me? Only challenging for nonpaying playing. Not a big fan of pay to win games. But LoA is always addicting and just makes you want to spend your money. Not suitable if you're addicted to that overall. More nonpaying support would be reasonable for them to at least be able to compete.

Latest updates just added more to this already enjoyable game.  However I wouldn't encourage new players to spend any money on the game as the benefits are nonexistant for what you pay. Which means a limited lifespan for the game if no one is paying.  Still a good game to enjoy on a mobile device.

description: Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels![Game Introduction]The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.	[Game Features]Superb Visual Presentation:- Stunning combat effects- Dynamic 3D scenery- Exquisite character art and designEngaging Strategy:- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategyMultiple Progression Methods:- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strengthWide Variety of Gameplay:- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goalsVisit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!
- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals
- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals


Visit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/
Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
developerAddress: 12/F San Toi Bldg,137 - 139 Connaught Rd C,Sheung Wan,Hong Kong

comments: Only given a 1 star so the devs hurry up and get the game working again or else it would be a 5 star. But fix the loading issue so we can get back to akademia!!

Great game so far. Not sure if there is a community forum or something somewhere which would be nice. I had a character on some other server and it seemed to be erased when the new server opened? Its fine though, previous character did not have too much progression. Music is not the greatest though, would be good if you could include more classic FF music in the game.   Dailys seem a bit overwhelming. There are so many quests to complete each day to get all the chests.   Other than that im quite enjoying it. If you can't load the game after update clear data and dl again

Support is incredibly slow, they will happily take your money and not let you have access to the items you payed for. Will update this review if they ever actually resolve my issue. It has been 5 days since I submitted a support issue with no useful responses made by them. Update: over 48 hours since last response still not any closer to having my issue resolved

I installed the game. I was enjoying it then suddenly it stoped working giving me an error message of "license stoped working". I uninstalled it and will try to install it. I hope this time it won't happen again.   What?? Still having the same error! Please do something about it, since the game is really nice.

I was hooked up playing this game as you can still get stronger without spending. Unfortunately looks like something broke during the update and was stucked in the FF splash screen. Hoping that the devs are on top of this and release an official announcement to players.

Characters repeat the same thing over and over and it gets really irritating. And now the game doesn't even start, i love the final fantasy franchise and you have a really great game, and i like that you have to interact with the game to stay alive and it's not just automatic bullcrap, please keep updating the game.
description: 【Game Introduction】:An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.【Features】:-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
descriptionHTML:
【Game Introduction】:

An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)

Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.

【Features】:

-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.

-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.

-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.

-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.

Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/
Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
developerAddress: 1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong
recentChanges: Optimizations:
·The downloading speed gets improved.
·The loading resources gets optimized.
summary: The Sole SQUARE ENIX Official Licensed "Final Fantasy" Action Game
title: Final Fantasy Awakening: SE Licensed

comments: I'm glad that you've finally thrown in 5v5. It's a lot of fun.  I'm aware you're trying to do your own thing as far as mobas go but I'd appreciate it if you'd consider adding a way to set up your own build before entering que. Many mobas do the same and I enjoy putting my own spin on builds without having to sit in the shop menu in game for 30+ seconds attempting to adjust everything from the standard builds.  Just a thought.  Thanks for this amazing game. =)

The game is pretty good and the 5vs5 was the update I have been waiting for. Very easy to play nice graphics and controls are easy as well. But since the update 3.1 I have been getting bad pings but my internet is pretty good above 5 mbps constant an bing are well below 50. So have been getting thumbs down for rude pings. Kindly check i have been playing this gane for almost 2 years now. I dont want to remove the games.

I've playing vg since its been 2 years before 5v5 update. After the updates i was start matching up time was taking pretty long and when it start to play the screen doesn't show up, after that it return to vg homescreen. Vanglory is one of my favourite game in these years and i don't want to take it off from my device. Try to fix the issue pls.thx

Couldn't get free rewards for halycon, I clicked on them and it did nothing. I also had a rare mystery chest key and When I clicked to use it, it did nothing, not even get rid of the key. I had to reinstall and it still didn't work, please, help. I also never got that free chest for creating a profile. Very much appreciated if you help. I also don't know how to claim my five free heroes and one skin .-. And it shows I have no wins, which I do, but please, this really needs to be fixed!! I'm sure it's not just me who is having this problem. I also can't open my EPIC mystery chest, even though I have a key. Fix this.

Nice gameplay, very good looking graphic for a MOBA game, on phone obviously. Very nice and comfortable controls. Impressive multiplayer and, fighting system. But The only problem i found is sometimes i still disconnecting from games due to low internet connection, but i got a solid 10MBps speed. I hope Super Evil MC quickly fixes this up. Really irritating when im fighting with enemy hero and you just "pop" disconnected. The others features are just fine.

50 mbps connection with 47 pings tested during gameplay. Every time i start vainglory 5v5, works well. 10 mins in the ping goes to 30000 ms. I close the game and go to speedtest to check if my network works fine. ITS BEEN WORKING GREAT THE WHOLE TIME. i get back on the game and the ping is still 30000 ms till it goes back to normal after 5 mins. 5 MINS LOST. and after the game is over? DESERTER! do not push updates when your servers cant handle it. Its been happening to many players but they keep on thinking its their nets fault. Smh...
description: Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile. Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience. At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device. If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:- Real line-of-sight Fog of War- 120 FPS pro-motion support- Skill-based play & decision-making- Macro & rotational strategies- Objective-rich 3-lane map- Free Camera- Last-hitting- Wave Control- Lane Teleports- Active items- Intricate vision system- Original fantasy characters and storytellingVainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.----------------------"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK----------------------Features:== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease. == Guilds & Teams ==Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.== Chests & Quests ==Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!== Vibrant Community ==Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.----------------------Twitter: https://twitter.com/vaingloryReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/vainglorygameFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/vainglorygameTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/vainglory

At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device.

If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.

THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:

- Real line-of-sight Fog of War
- 120 FPS pro-motion support
- Skill-based play & decision-making
- Macro & rotational strategies
- Objective-rich 3-lane map
- Free Camera
- Last-hitting
- Wave Control
- Lane Teleports
- Active items
- Intricate vision system
- Original fantasy characters and storytelling

Vainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.

----------------------

"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN

“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards

“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK

----------------------

Features:

== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==
Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.

== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==
Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.

== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==
Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease.

== Guilds & Teams ==
Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.

== Chests & Quests ==
Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.

== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==
Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!

== Vibrant Community ==
Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.

----------------------

comments: I absolutely love the story line and I've spent more on the game than I'd like to admit. But spending money doesn't really get you much farther because the energy goes so quickly. I think you would get far better reviews and more happy customers if you got rid of the energy system and upped the ads for more revenue from that standpoint. Then you could keep the micro transactions for the secret scenes. This way you'd still be making money,  but your customer retention would go up. I have so many ideas that would help this app out and I'd love to share them as I love this story. If you are interested in what I have to say please reply

I love the game. Wish we didnt have to pay for every secret scene and had a little bit more energies before having to wait for more or buy some. Would be great if we had more options for free energy. Love the story and characters. Hurry with season two already!!!  Im anxious to see further stories on ryan and the character Lol ❤.

It's really a good game. It's awesome! But that energies are my main problem! Don't you think that...... only 300 energies that means only 30 lines are not enough and too little for a day..!?..!???!.. and 10 energies per line isn't too much!!??! Please make it down to 5 energies for each lines...and only for dialogues.. And if you give 500 or 100 energies (if 1 line cost 5 energies then there will be only 100 or 200 lines. Not much for a whole day!!!!!) and take 10 hours to get free energies again then the game will be perfect!! Everyone can't buy energies (including me)! You know! Please consider this case sympathetically.!.!..  I beg you.....!....

Lovely story line... love story that keeps you coming back everyday.... at times we are urged to buy energies.. however the energy provided gives sufficient dosage of the story each day... sad that it's going to get to the end...  And i wish I could go back and re read certain moments which is not possible.... apart from it.. this is amazing...

Great storylines!!! Great graphics!  However the energy to even do one chapter is way too low!!!  There should be more choices in filling up the energy.  Let your veiwers choose to watch more ad's or something similar to games where each day you can have one chapter and keep the secret moments as a paid option.  I myself would  have more of my friends play,share and even buy if the cost wasn't $100+ for ten chapters!  Oh and FYI check your editing just a few hiccups in a few clips.   Huge fan on the writer/authors...  Very steamy!! Sincerely JR

This game is misleading. You can only play the "secret scenes" if you pay, but the wording makes it sound like your choice so you keep playing in hopes you can see one. And the secret scenes I assume are the ones which actually push the relationship forward. The game staggers and is deeply misleading.
description: Is-It Love? Ryan invites you to join our community of virtual romance novels enthusiasts! In this epic & stunning visual novel game, your choices affect the progress of your love story in this CYOA (choose your own adventure) style Otome game. You’ve got a great apartment in the city and your good friends, Matt and Lisa, to keep you company. comments: I love this game. Just like other reviews say, it is addicting and because there are constant tasks to complete. Plus!..unlike other games, there is no way you ruin out of coins/money. The cities bring in alot. I can't agree with one reviewer that megabucks are hard not come by.  I began with 25 I believe (now at 32) and some of the tasks to complete give megabucks without spending actual money to even purchase some.  All in all, try this game and you won't run bored of it.

Best game!! Very addictive, Been playing this game for over a year.. although, there are still alot to improve!  I hope the developers will include edit mode in the next update so that the players can rearrange their city..Also, I hope they will also include a 360 rotation of the city and add factories that can also create materials needed in the game like the railroad materials and steels. I am looking forward with this updates!!

Great, but really needs "sell all" function for dealing with store house and "pecial buildings" components.This is a really quality game, looks amazing, works well and has good timed construction projects. However, as others mention it takes SOOOOOOO long to accrue the assets for construction and the mega bucks for expansion. You have to be VERY patient if you are not willing to part with actual cash. An idea might be to offer a conversion of coins to megabuck, maybe get 1 buck in excahge for eg 5,000,000 coins?

Good game but......after a day into it you make no coin. After every level upgrade it pushes the (buy) equipment option. Not to mention every time you level up. You got to.exit out 15 boxes.before you can continue. Good game but, it's a failure on the free to play aspect.  My rating is fair and final. It's a (ok)  game but many better ones out thwre

The new update is great! Really appreciate the chat system. But it could be better... maybe add some functionality to the capital buildings and states.... maybe bonuses to taxes nd pop, loans, and coop science and military missions. The prices of capital building materials is ridiculous. Fixing these will make the state system look more complete.

Been playing for more than 3 years, i lost count. But this is a wonderful game which encourages teamwork and neighbor support. There are barely any paywalls in this game and  if you have hundreds of facebook friends who have this game you can easily get the materials you need to expand your city. No limits so far. I give ★★★★★s

description: This soccer simulation game for the Pro Evolution Soccer series has racked up a total of 28 million downloads from all over the globe.Major update with the 2017/18 roster included.New elements such as My Hometown area expansions with new facilities, an online live match mode against members in the same Association, and a ""Limit Break"" feature, which extends the players' potential maximum abilities, have been added in the new version.This world standard of soccer simulation games will continue to evolve.Test your soccer management skills in various roles, including as a coach, a scout, and a general manager against rivals from around the world![PES Console Game Engine on Mobile Devices]Enjoy playing realistic soccer matches with high-quality 3D graphics and analyzing tactics in realtime on an animated 2D screen.[Licenses Around the Globe]Official licenses for popular European and Southern American teams/leagues are included, with more than 5,000 authentic players.[Soccer Simulation Enjoyable for Core Strategists (Basic Gameplay All Free)]Simple controls allow you to easily set tactics during matches. The tide of matches will change based on your management skill.Experience gripping matches in which you are in total control.[Try out your Soccer Theory in Player Training Mode]Train players however you want by assigning them to a quality trainer and the training venue of your choice. You can compete against rivals around the world with the team built under your team concept.[User-Driven League]No need to log in at a fixed time. Play each season at your own pace.[Play the Global Standard of Soccer Games for Free]Winning matches with your own tactics/skills is more satisfying. Win League/Cup rewards to build your team. Bid for players on the market at the lowest price.We recommend PES CLUB MANAGER if you:・For those who want to construct a great stadium that will be iconic to the club's fans, just like how Borussia Dortmund did.・Possess a soccer philosophy like FC BARCELONA.・For those who are attracted to clubs like Borussia Dortmund, a team that contributes to their hometown and is loved by their local fans.・Believe tradition is important for a soccer club.・Think a soccer club can become something more than a ""club"".・Believe ""winning in a style"" is the ideal victory.・Think soccer is all about tactics.・Want to manage a dream team with your favorite players.・Want to become an owner of a soccer club with a long history.・Want to test out new soccer tactics.・Are curious about young soccer stars.・Are curious about mid-season transfers.・Watch national matches.・Root for young players in international tournaments.・Think training young generations is important.・Think philosophy is necessary for strong clubs.・Soccer is your favorite sport.* PES CLUB MANAGER is a free-to-play app. No purchases are required. All users can play the entire game free of charge, although purchasing PES Coins can speed up gameplay and help to strengthen your club faster. In-app purchases can be disabled by “limiting in-app billing” on the device used.Required OS: Android 4.2.0 or later*Operation is not guaranteed on other OSes.Compatible devices:https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#compatibilty*Please note that support is not offered in response to inquiries that involve non-compatible devices.This is an online game only. Users must be connected to the internet (3G,4G,or Wi-Fi) to play. Internet connection charges may be incurred separately depending on the user's network environment.Use of this app requires agreement to the app’s Terms of Use, Virtual Currency Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.License Rights:https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#license
descriptionHTML:
This soccer simulation game for the Pro Evolution Soccer series has racked up a total of 28 million downloads from all over the globe.
Major update with the 2017/18 roster included.
New elements such as My Hometown area expansions with new facilities, an online live match mode against members in the same Association, and a ""Limit Break"" feature, which extends the players' potential maximum abilities, have been added in the new version.
This world standard of soccer simulation games will continue to evolve.
Test your soccer management skills in various roles, including as a coach, a scout, and a general manager against rivals from around the world!

[PES Console Game Engine on Mobile Devices]
Enjoy playing realistic soccer matches with high-quality 3D graphics and analyzing tactics in realtime on an animated 2D screen.

[Licenses Around the Globe]
Official licenses for popular European and Southern American teams/leagues are included, with more than 5,000 authentic players.

[Soccer Simulation Enjoyable for Core Strategists (Basic Gameplay All Free)]
Simple controls allow you to easily set tactics during matches. The tide of matches will change based on your management skill.
Experience gripping matches in which you are in total control.

[Try out your Soccer Theory in Player Training Mode]
Train players however you want by assigning them to a quality trainer and the training venue of your choice. You can compete against rivals around the world with the team built under your team concept.

[User-Driven League]
No need to log in at a fixed time. Play each season at your own pace.

[Play the Global Standard of Soccer Games for Free]
Winning matches with your own tactics/skills is more satisfying. Win League/Cup rewards to build your team. Bid for players on the market at the lowest price.

We recommend PES CLUB MANAGER if you:
・For those who want to construct a great stadium that will be iconic to the club's fans, just like how Borussia Dortmund did.
・Possess a soccer philosophy like FC BARCELONA.
・For those who are attracted to clubs like Borussia Dortmund, a team that contributes to their hometown and is loved by their local fans.
・Believe tradition is important for a soccer club.
・Think a soccer club can become something more than a ""club"".
・Believe ""winning in a style"" is the ideal victory.
・Think soccer is all about tactics.
・Want to manage a dream team with your favorite players.
・Want to become an owner of a soccer club with a long history.
・Want to test out new soccer tactics.
・Are curious about young soccer stars.
・Are curious about mid-season transfers.
・Watch national matches.
・Root for young players in international tournaments.
・Think training young generations is important.
・Think philosophy is necessary for strong clubs.
・Soccer is your favorite sport.


* PES CLUB MANAGER is a free-to-play app. No purchases are required. All users can play the entire game free of charge, although purchasing PES Coins can speed up gameplay and help to strengthen your club faster. In-app purchases can be disabled by “limiting in-app billing” on the device used.

Required OS: Android 4.2.0 or later
*Operation is not guaranteed on other OSes.

Compatible devices:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#compatibilty
*Please note that support is not offered in response to inquiries that involve non-compatible devices.

This is an online game only. Users must be connected to the internet (3G,4G,or Wi-Fi) to play. Internet connection charges may be incurred separately depending on the user's network environment.
Use of this app requires agreement to the app’s Terms of Use, Virtual Currency Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

License Rights:
https://www.konami.com/wepes/mobile/pescm/en/#license
developerAddress: 東京都港区赤坂9丁目7番2号
recentChanges: [Update Details]
• Bug fixes and optimization
summary: The club management simulation game of the "Pro Evolution Soccer" series!
title: PES CLUB MANAGER

description: Featured globally by Google Play!◆ "This new strategy game gives you full control in a world full of dwarves, magic, and monsters. Featured globally by Google Play!

Besiege enemy strongholds to expand your kingdom, slay nefarious dragons with a band of legendary heroes, and challenge players around the world to epic real-time battles!

comments: BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They actually try to get you to feel sorry for them.  Its amazing.  They will only steal from you.

This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.
Nice that this game is helpful to a point. Yes could be a little bit more forthcoming about items and there do's and don't on Upgrades and applications
Just getting started I guess

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.

descriptionHTML:
- Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!
- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!

I built, I sailed, I conquered!
Join the battle NOW!

With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.

Mighty Space Arks
- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.
- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.
- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.

Ultimate Galactic Military Power
- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.
- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.
- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.

MMO Strategic Gameplay
- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.
- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.
- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. Use diplomacy to establish the order of your world.
- Trade your equipment and resources with other players and become a space merchant.

comments: I wasnt sure about this series at first, but it's really grown on me. The unique art style, interesting characters and immersive world make this an incredible game, especially considering it's a free mobile app! I would definitely love to see more sims like this in the future, (especially with the bad boy type). Seeing it transfer to desktop would be awesome! Overall, everything about this game is wonderful but, like everyone else says, the amount of energy given for free isn't enough! I think it would be wise to either lower the cost of energy actions take, give more free energy out, or split the story into parts in which 1 part can be played for free each day. Other than that it's a great sim!

My absolute favorite of all of the Is it Love games. Colin is an amazing character with an equally amazing backstory, and the way he connects with the MC is just incredible. The twists and turns in each chapter leave me craving more of the story. The energy they give you is somewhat lacking, but I'm used to it by now. Highly reccomend!

Really don't like how the guy treats the girl, what a scumbag! Plus I've been playing for over a week and the plot is unbelievably slow, the energy doesn't last long enough. There are much better otome style games out there.

Well the energy situation is beyond annoying. You only get very little for free and the prices for the energy and just WAY too expensive. I do like the story a lot though and will probably take 8 years to complete the story so I don't have to pay 50 bucks

OK, so I absolutely agree with everyone that the energy you get for free is nowhere near enough & packages are too expensive for what you get. I know, I've bought many. This story particular started bad, but now that I'm at the end, I'm hooked. Please continue to update. I have lots of bought energy going to waste!!

I don't really like the concept of earning energy every 24 hours. But I've got to say every time i see that message when my energy runs out. It leaves me on a cliffhanger and it keeps me in the story. Even if the energy wasn't there i would still play the game to my hearts content! Overall AMAZING story and characters!!
description: Is it Love? Colin is an  interactive story  in English.Like in a TV series, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released.You can download this love game for free. Will you find Love? Will you make it in the musical world? Story: "You come from a small town, you have a well-ordered life: Basic studies, a very respectful boyfriend and parents who decided on your future. You've always dreamed of becoming a pianist, But your father didn't look on it with a favourable eye, so you did what was expected of you. And then, one day, you felt trapped in your monotonous life. So you decided to leave it all behind and move to New York. But, after so many years, having put your dreams aside, your piano gathered dust and your mojo disappeared. At the Carter Corporation, you found a stable office job and good friends. And one night, Matt invites you along to a rock concert. A concert that changes everything. Your encounter with Colin, the leader of the group, turns your world upside down. This black-hearted character as stirring as he is inaccessible will awaken that old fire that burned in your heart: your love of music... " Main points: ✓ Experience a true love story✓ Your choices influence the course of the episode✓ 100% in English.✓ Become a rock starAn Otome is a visual novel type game in which you are the heroine about to live true romance (love story) with possible twists (Love, seduction, betrayal, marriage...) comments: This game is designed to defraud and manipulate you out of every penny these pukes can steal from you. "Wanna get stronger? Well buy some diamonds" (Pay to win) Then they just nerf your general or beef up another to con you into buying more diamonds. It's all a scam.

Just hit level 88 with 5 awakened and it wouldn't let my me log  froze was told to del from the website provided in the freeze screen followed instructions started me at lol 1 I had the account for over 2 years and my loggin is the same as old account. Game will be deleted if they don't fix the problem.

The game is awesome, except for the fact that to be truly.competetive they are asking for absurd amounts of money that in some countries even in Europe are equal to monthly salaries... And that just for the possibility to get same heroes as other "richer" players :(

Very pricy game with limited game play. You will spend a lot of money to advance. There is no other reasonable way to play. Too many moderators/players( they play for free) who steal/destroy resources causing you to spend even more money. The game is a money pit. Stay away.

Please fix the launch. I cant log in. i have reinstalled it multiple times. If it is a maintenance thing or update,shouldnt you at least talk about it in your facebook page or forum?If I lose my account because of this....

To compete even fairly with the others, it's either you SPEND TONS OF MONEY or play the game for a long time, patience is needed here (not even joking, grind hard, pray hard for rng).  While it's a P2W game, I assure you it is fun and addicting for just casual play. Lots of contents in the game to keep you playing.  Finally, DEAR DEVELOPERS kindly reduce the stamina consumption and the number of soul stones needed for raising stars. This helps us, casual players, a lot.
description: War is coming – Will you be ready? Summon heroes to defend your kingdom and charge the enemy in this one-of-a-kind RTS adventure!Magic Rush: Heroes is a revolutionary combination of skill-aiming controls, a thrilling, real-time PvP Ladder Tourney mode, exciting multiplayer World Map battles, simple yet addicting Tower Defense, and more! Experience the fun of multiple different genres all wrapped up in one extraordinary game.Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won’t forget!FeaturesSummon Powerful Attacks With Skill-Aiming- Manually choose targets or directions when casting skills. You call the shots!- Summon attacks to stun, silence, knock airborne, heal and even interrupt enemy skills using precise controls- Strategy and speed combine. Master them both, and victory is truly in your hands!Hero Training Powers You Up to Defend the Kingdom- Role play as diverse hero types, including dozens of unlockable heroes with hundreds of distinctive skills.- Heroes can be combined in different ways and take the opposition by storm.- Upgrade your defender with equipment enhancing, rune inlaying, and unique upgrades and abilities for every kind of weapon.- RPGs and RTS combine to bring you the ultimate Equipment System.PvP Games in the Ladder Tourney- Charge to war in a global, cross-server PvP Arena with a turn-based ban/pick phase to level the playing field.- Defend your victory by strategically banning your opponent’s heroes depending on your own battle plan.- PvP combat offers awesome rewards for every season!War Strategy and RTS Gameplay- RTS combat challenges you to build your tower, upgrade your tech, and dispatch your armies to plunder resources from enemies.- Defend the kingdom together! Create alliances with millions of players from around the world to thrive in this war-torn landscape.- RTS battles let you conquer enemies to become the dominant alliance!Hero Tower Defense Combines Your Favorite Strategy Genres- An all-new “Hero Tower Defense” concept cleverly combines the heroes of the game with dozens of exquisitely designed Tower Defense stages.- Drop tower emplacements and activate Hero abilities in real time during exciting battles that you won’t want to put down!- Defend your based on one-of-a-kind map creations.Constant Updates Offer- New heroes- In-game events- Weekly updates based on your feedback and suggestions!- Hard-working developers are constantly updating and improving the gaming experience with new gameplay!Are you the defender this kingdom needs? Download Magic Rush: Heroes and join the RTS war today!PLEASE NOTE! Magic Rush is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Magic Rush.Have any questions or issues with the free tower defense RPG adventure game from Elex Tech? comments: I actually really like this game, graphics are beautiful and the concept is fun... problem is, I've had it a week and been in the game 4x. It doesn't load... like ever. I've restarted my phone, uninstalled and installed and nothing. It just sits on the opening screen, sadly I will have to delete. Wish I didn't have to but it's just wasting space on my phone now. Otherwise, I did enjoy it.

Its completely pay to play. You have to use diamonds to expand your land, but you can't earn them. You have to buy them with real money. It would be a problem if you could buy a small amount for like $0.99... But the minimum is $10 Its ridiculous.

I would love the game,if there was really something to do, no interaction,from what I've read this is a useless app.i got on after the update today,and my screen is blank except for my buildings,the scenery is gone,black! I am on a mobile and can't use any of the great functions everyone talks about. I can't even help my team,totally disappointed,that's for sure. And I've spent quite a bit of money. I am so bored.Theres only a couple things to enjoy on it.Come on ,why can't you get this game together for Android users?

Playing on the phone app. I am disappointed that I cannot play the full version. I cannot send messages to my fellowship members, I cannot see their cities, I cannot participate in the events with my teammates. All I am doing all day every day is trying to build up resources for upgrades, and those are high compared with how much you can make. You cannot earm free diamonds, and many of the buildings you cannot get without them. Will rate higher when these things are improved.

The game is beautiful, but its a bit to complicated. And the in app purchases are rediculus. I'd love it if you could actually advance in the games. There are just too many things needed to advance in the slightest. It's too bad cuz the game it has great graphics.
Game is great. Love building games. Only letdown is that is pay-to-win. It would be better if non-paying players would have little more easy time with game, like give more builders at least... 😉
description: BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENARChoose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.CHOOSE YOUR RACEPlay as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fitSTART INSTANTLYCity building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active communityEXPLORE THE WORLDDiscover new provinces to expand your cityTRADE WITH FRIENDSTrade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplaceADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATIONUpgrade your buildings to supply your growing populationWELCOME NEW CREATURESCreate a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy racesElvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account. Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint

InnoGames GmbH
Friesenstraße 13
20097 Hamburg

description: Bei diesem Spiel handelt es sich um ein Strategie- und Aufbauspiel, dessen Hauptthema das Sammeln und Entwickeln von Monstern ist. Die Monster, die sich in dieser wundersamen Welt tummeln, verfügen über einen individuellen Entwicklungsweg. Außerdem können Spieler ihren Monstern Flügel und Reittiere zur Verfügung stellen. Besonders spannend wird es, wenn sich Spieler im Zweikampf messen. Doch neben dem Wettbewerb gibt es auch Kooperation! Verbünde dich mit deinen Freunden und gründet gemeinsam eine Arena! Dann könnt ihr zusammen gegen den Welt-Boss in die Schlacht ziehen! Dich erwartet das volle Spielvergnügen!

Game is actually mindlessly fun. Climb the ladder and get stronger, and win tournaments. However, the game is not balanced for casual players and the development put a huge emphasis on pay to play. If you want to climb you really have to give up your life and keep climbing, and pay so you can simply redo your skills as you gain more. Hard to justify committing so much time.

Love the game! That is until I got a new phone(LG G6) that is plenty capable of playing this game. Now it opens to a black screen and sits there. I'd love to continue to play, but unless this is fixed, I'll look for something else, not that I want to...
The new Valentine's update is annoying. Whenever I try to log into my existing account it keeps on saying unable to connect to server. Please fix I still like this game.

comments: This is a great game. It's fun, addictive, and a great time killer. The only problem I see is that I created an account on the game thinking it would save. WRONG! I had to do a factory reset on my phone and now I have to start over. I was so far with some really good cards, but alas I know more about the game now, so maybe I'll get there quicker this time.

Don't bother downloading this game.  The customer service in this game is terrible.  I submitted a ticket because several combinations i researched in game disappeared.  I got a response that the game would fix itself and my ticket was being closed.  The problem didn't fix itself and i can't remember every combo lost. I submitted another ticket and I'm waiting for a response but after how my first ticket was handled I'm not confident they'll fix it. I've only been playing a few days but if the game is this buggy already then i don't recommend downloading it.

It's actually surprisingly fun. The card mechanics are simple to grasp but with a enough depth to keep you trying new decks and combos. I chuckled a few times at some of the dialouge between the characters. 10/10 would recommend

The game is addictive, but in short it's a gamble for cards. The prices are a lot for what you are getting. Lots of repetitive challenges. Unfortunately the quest for cards is really a quest for your wallet. I played since 9/16 and decided to walk away. Unfortunately you get to a point where the only way to move up is to spend, spend, spend. The gambling pulls for cards on real money game currency got old.

The main problem with the game in my opinion is being able to attack your opponent while they have other cards in play. Perhaps if you could choose to block rather than be forced to take it the game would be a bit better aa youd have to manage your resources a bit better rather than beat hard until its over. Aside from that it is a very fun game to play

Waste of money. No matter what you spend you never get decent cards. They stack the odds so no matter how you buy cards you'll always get ripped off. Mom's box is supposedly random yet I've bought hundreds of boxes I've never got anything worth a damn. I've played over a year and wasted a hundred bucks on this game w no reward. I strongly recommend you don't spend a dollar on this game. It won't help. The game will still screw you. Money will not help on this game.
