comments: I absolutely love this game. I make it a point to not spend money on mobile games cus they typically turn out to be a cash trap, but this was just like buying a regular video game. No adds, and even before buying the full game it doesn't shove "buy our product" notifications down your throat. Nintendo has always had good games and I have no doubts that I will keep playing this every day.

Was pretty short to begin with but Nintendo has supported this game well, adding additional content, even a new mode. The simplified game mechanics to fit Mario gaming on a phone work great and feel natural. The story with it's additional challenges to open new courses are fun, toad run is addictive, the remix 10 is somewhat redundant content wise but also good. I'd rather pay $10 up front than have in-game purchases, the reception to this game indicates that I'm very much in the minority on that. Great game, very fun for a quick session of Mario.

Awesome update! Make the game worth again, when it seems Nintendo had abandoned Super Mario Run, they back and release more content for the half of the price. This is the kind of update I was waiting for, once I didn't paid the game yet, I think this could be a great time to purchase. Probably in the future they will release more content, but the price will back to 9.99, so the best time to purchase is now! Great job Nintendo, I love your games since my childhood.

Awesome and all, but you only get 4 levels for free. To go to world 2, WHY IN THE UNIVERSAL WORLD RIGHT HERE IN A CITY (lol😀) DO YOU HAVE TO BUY WORLD 2, 3, 4, 5, AND 6? TALK ABOUT A RIPOFF! 😞 (Warning to Nintendo: If you dont fix this soon, I'm deleting. Sorry!)

Favorite game. It has a one time cost for full version and not a monthly fee or several different things you have to buy to enjoy it. I like the updates with the remix, and the star courses. I didnt like that there was so little to do before I bought it. I got bored quick. But was surprised by the cost, and love it after buying it. I do wish we could see our friends land and share things we don't need and give rally tickets to others.

This is just proof Nintendo can make amazing games no matter the platform. All the bad reviews are people's mad you gotta pay for the game. Lol wut? It's a great time killer made  by the best gaming company in the world and you're mad it's not free? Funny. There's no IAP.  It's not pay to win. But it is the most fun 5$ will ever buy you.
description: A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.■World TourRun and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches! Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.After rescuing Princess Peach, a nine-course special world, World Star, will appear.■Remix 10Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!■Toad RallyShow off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow. ■Kingdom BuilderGather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds・ All courses in World Tour are playableWhy not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?・ Easier to get Rally TicketsIt's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.・ More playable charactersIf you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?・ More courses in Toad RallyThe types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom BuilderThe types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.・ Play Remix 10 without having to waitYou can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

After rescuing Princess Peach, a nine-course special world, World Star, will appear.

■Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
developerAddress: 京都府京都市南区上鳥羽鉾立町11-1

Why not try out the updated Super Mario Run?"
summary: Control Mario with just a tap!
title: Super Mario Run

comments: Not a bad game but it's typical like some other games. It starts off with the levels being super easy, letting you build your confidence to get you thinking you're really good.  Now I understand the higher the levels the more difficulty there is but not to the point where they make it almost impossible trying to get you to buy more chances. Another words they're trying to get you to pay to win and advance not necessarily on skill level. Very sneaky. Uninstalling. It's fun for a while but overall I do not recommend.
I love this game, but this afternoon it's going in slow motion! It's very hard to play this way! Everything else is working fine I'm my phone. I even restarted it to see if that would help - no luck!

Love this game, but it freezes up. I go to try and reinstall it after a few days but it won't let me reinstall the game. Just stays at the same  level last completed. Still having the problem of when having to reinstall I lose all my lives and charms. Love the game but hate ,owing all my lives and charms

The update took me from level 400 back to level 1 very upset be first I wasn't getting my daily play rewards so I figured like everything else it may need to update and the update blow my whole progress. I'm so pissed is there a way to fix this?

I actually enjoyed the game and would give it four or five stars except 200 coins and multiple items were taking away simply because I got logged out if Facebook. Also several levels were lost.... This I understand, glitches happen. What I don't understand and don't accept is the lack of response from the developer. I've sent several emails and have yet to get a non automated response.
I installed the game about 3 times and gave up. Can't connect with Facebook and when playing it suddenly stop and say it's not responding.

comments: Overall great game as far as playing is concerned. Major thing that could use work is matchmaking. Currently an 89 overall getting matched against 98-105 overall players. No chance to win and may discourage some people from playing the game. The gameplay is awesome and I have lots of fun, 100% worth your time if you avoid Head-to-head or tournaments (unless you have money or don't mind being poorly matched).

This is my full honest review. Madden Mobile is back!! I'll admit before it was not fun and I complained that you need to pay to win but EA really did good when I came back to play. The game is fun and is somewhat easy to get 100 overall players and now they are bringing back Draft Champs and I have seen early drafts and it looks great. The promos are great. I would like to say great job EA on bringing this game back and making it fun. I always want to play everyday and build my Ultimate Team

I have played this game for 3 seasons now.  I can't even begin to say all that is wrong, but one of the things that stands out most to me, is that your players stats mean nothing.  You spend a lot of time and effort completing events and grinding, and improve your team only to find out that when you play a team way below your level, it seems that that teams players are much faster and tend to play way above their ability.  this game seems to have the liberal bug that everyone is equal.  I am done with this game, don't get caught up with it, it's not worth the waste of your time

Thanks alot EA for this new head to head style. Great to know that all the grinding and work put in is only allowing those who have a 100 overall or better reap the rewards. Everytime playing one of these individuals they have a counter for every single play. This really turns me off to the game.

For the person hoping to find Madden 18, this is the closest thing you are gonna get. Yes, it doesn't have practice mode or my player mode, but it DOES have a incredible roster of players that you bargain for. The graphics are pretty good for a game on a smartphone.  Overall, this game is a MUST HAVE for NFL fans. 10 outta 10.

You know I really like all of the Live Events but when I get these old collectible cards that aren't worth anything I have to cut them one by one. It takes way too long and I've got over a hundred. I would suggest having a way to group delete or in Madden terms "cut" the old dead weight.

comments: I've been playing this game, since it came out. I love it the same as I did then to now. This game does allow f2p to challenger some p2p as well. Sure there is a point where there is a wall, but at least you know your one of the strongest. Plus it makes me want to climb that wall, and topple whales.

Maybe one of the best games that still let you play to win. You can get everything with enough patience and a little luck. If you do want to pay though, it's gonna be pretty expensive and the stuff you get does not really let you advance a lot (unless you actually spend A LOT of money).

+ Easy to play + Good story line + Also easy to get the items + I like the game mechanic  - Need more challenging on battle - Need table of hero type - Inventory items don't include the gear being use  Overall i like this game, very good. Also, more hero will make this game more good. And... adding charge chain attack will be awesome  Edit: After update my account was lost, please fix it

This game is great. It doesnt beat you over the head with paywalls, you could probably play f2p and still have a ton of fun. Graphics are good and mechanics are deep and satisfying. Only complaint is the reddit coommunity, but cant blame the devs for that.

Previous rating was 👍👍. Now 👍.  Content drought at the end of the game with some very expensive in app purchases. End game is killing the same dragon or farming the same level over and over and over...there are daily tasks which are a chore. Hoping for quality of life improvements similar to what the reddit suggests.   I really like the art style.

Great game with the most responsive and generous developers.  The only thing bad about this game is the toxic gaming community.  Full of unjustifiable whiners who are so poor they need their freebies for EVERY event or else they have a hissy fit and threaten to quit game AND also cry koz of nerfs on their heroes and threaten to quit(but really don't). They also attack every person who does spend for the game (casual spender or whale) God-forbid the devs need to also earn for a living.

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Love the overall feel of this, though some things need tweeking. For example, I only have half of the staff available and am now getting far too many duplicate cards concidering how many I have left to get. Makes it feel all too much like it's pushing people to spend real money, something that always ends with me deleting the game and moving on. Hope this doesn't happen in this case, but I'm not holding my breath...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.

This game will cheat you! I  upgraded a bunch of my characters but the next time I logged in nothing had saved! The funds I used to upgrade were also gone, of course. Don't waste money buying anything because the upgrades you make just disappear.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristics🚑  Play the most realistic surgery simulations🚑  Build your own hospital🚑  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives🚑  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department🚑  Dive into two captivating seasons 🚑  Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.THREE'S COMPANYCombine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!RELIVE THE BLEACH STORYFollow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.BATTLE OTHER PLAYERSCompete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERSBrave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!Official Sitehttps://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/TwitterAccount: @bleachbrs_enHashtag: #BraveSoulsFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/Recommended OS Android 4.0 or laterThe following permissions are necessary to play this game.Storage AccessPermission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGEPermission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGENecessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. descriptionHTML:
EXCITING 3D ACTION
3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.

EPIC SPECIAL MOVES
Unleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.

THREE'S COMPANY
Combine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!

RELIVE THE BLEACH STORY
Follow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.

BATTLE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.

DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERS
Brave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!

Official Site
https://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/

Twitter
Account: @bleachbrs_en
Hashtag: #BraveSouls

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/

Recommended OS
Android 4.0 or later

The following permissions are necessary to play this game.
Storage Access
Permission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Permission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Necessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions.

Identity (find accounts on this device)
Permission: GET_ACCOUNTS
Necessary to receive push notifications.

Camera/Microphone Access
Permission: CAMERA / RECORD_AUDIO
Necessary for using the video recording function.

-----------------------------------------------------
© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). Anyway, besides this i do not regret playing the game, easy controls, f2p friendly, graphics is good, controls are good. Keep up the good work devs!looking forward to more updates
For the love of God let me grammar check your game...

comments: Constantly get matched up with people that are level 50+ as a level 10. The game is obviously nothing but pay to win and luck. It doesn't even try to mask the pay to win aspect of it. The rewards for winning are laughable compared to what you need to actually progress and the spin wheel lands on the worst possible prize every single time. Gee, thanks for the 50 coins every 24 hours!

I keep loosing my coins because of glitches. I just lost 70,000 coins. Please fix. other than that game is super fun. Once I stop loosing my coin on glitches I'll change ratings. It's 2018 and it still steals my coins. Rating will remainder the same

Worst connection of any game I've ever played. When you're a new player with maybe 100 to 200 games you are sometimes matched with people with 12000 games. What's the point? I guess the experienced players play against the beginners to master their play. Seems like you would be in a pool of players with similar skills  or number of games or rank. Even if I'm close to winning a game, the connection sucks then it starts over.

comments: Would be 5 stars if I could get back into the game. Have tried uninstalling but it still keeps crashing after the loading screen. A Mikaela screen comes up with a Start Download button and it crashes on this screen.  Update: I can't login on your website to log a ticket with your support team.

I do miss the old LOA - Fire Raider style of art and play, just came back after maybe a year or so and it was gone! But, Paradise seems pretty cool so far, only thing I'm not a big fan of is how everything deals with irl money while in the 'old' one you could build up gems or materials for certain things like VIP levels; also I heard about rewards being given to old players like me? That's pretty cool, will have to check that out... But yea, so far I like the game, miss the old style but it's still good to me, will update this later on when I play more.
Gave you people an opportunity to fix the stupid chibi icon characters. The latest update didn't fix that so uninstalled.  Also do not reply with a generic response cause you can kiss my ass

Only challenging for nonpaying playing. Not a big fan of pay to win games. But LoA is always addicting and just makes you want to spend your money. Not suitable if you're addicted to that overall. More nonpaying support would be reasonable for them to at least be able to compete.

Latest updates just added more to this already enjoyable game.  However I wouldn't encourage new players to spend any money on the game as the benefits are nonexistant for what you pay. Which means a limited lifespan for the game if no one is paying.  Still a good game to enjoy on a mobile device.

description: Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels![Game Introduction]The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.	[Game Features]Superb Visual Presentation:- Stunning combat effects- Dynamic 3D scenery- Exquisite character art and designEngaging Strategy:- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategyMultiple Progression Methods:- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strengthWide Variety of Gameplay:- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goalsVisit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/
descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!
- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals
- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals


Visit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/
Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/

comments: Well this is not a grate game this game is FANTASTIC  !!! Haven't seen any adds in over two weeks I've been playing it. Thank you! Came back to update on my experience with this game. Over a month paying no  surprises, no adds, no asking to rate it just wonderful. Challenging at times than easyer and so on. Congratulations to the creators of this game and keep up the grate job!!! I am at the level 126!

There's a glitch that I wish would be fixed before I decide to uninstall for good. Lost all of my gold bars, all of my cherries upon reinstall. It's a shame.

comments: Buggy! Once they fix the signing bugs, this might be a good game. Now, there are widespread examples of users not being able to get in; instead, it freezes at a white screen.  Many videos crash the game, which means you lose the treat you would otherwise earn by watching those ads. Other crashing problems as well.

For not getting even the first event bird out of 3 in alien excavation after opening so many premium eggs reaching (*4) of the premium eggs. I blame - chimera and rovio. Either the makers of the game are idiots or the game is stupid and seriously 2000 per month for an imaginary egg everyday that cannot guarantee a 4 or 5 star bird. Yeah, the makers of the game really are idiots.

the game is really fun and humorous. I love the clan feature- found a great clan to be part of. there are glitches that rovio needs to iron out that affect play. I am hoping this new big update helps fix all that. the changes look to be really good. excited to see what they've done.

I did not expect to enjoy this nearly as much as I have. The frequent events are nice and having a guild just makes them better. I don't feel compelled to be social be because there is no chat, just playing the game. It is a wonderful balance.

Love the game. The game play is great. Only down side is that I feel that the game cheats against me sometimes by adding enemies. Only happened about 3 times now. ***edit*** I have since realized there are certain pigs that do add more pigs when hit. The game doesn't cheat. I'm extremely happy with the game play and ability to build a great team without paying a whole bunch of money. You just need patients and good planning.

Decent game, lots of fun to keep you coming back. I would of rated a 4 star game but every time I need to watch a video the game stops working, stopping me from getting a free premium egg or opening chests!
description: Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.Embark on an epic adventure.Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.Crush the pigs in explosive battles.What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.Join weekly events.Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost! Compete against other players.The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.FEATURES:– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.This game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

comments: Last comment 2/19 I was in board 1170. Today 3/12 I am on 1240. Pkease fix the boards with the water buckets... The pieces fall on top of each other which prevents proper play. Also, when making moves the move I make is not the move that happens. Also, when watching the video for the xtra coin: when the video ends the game restarts taking me back to tohome screen to press play to enter back into the game.. Thank you loyal player!!

The sound effects of the tornado is kind of frightening but I don't fear because all the characters are near as I ease on down the road. The characters interactions will assist if I follow the yellow brick road. "I can't wait to meet the wizard" I believe I'm going to be granted more golden bricks to extend the yellow brick road. I'm curious like a lion. Lol. The best for the whole family. Thanks!

This is by far the greatest game that I've ever played! A lot of my friends play as well, so I  can enjoy playing for a long time. Caution: Very addictive game!!! I find it hard to stop playing once I start. This is one app that you're going to want to download if you want to have some fun.

I use to enjoy playing this game.  Lately though, there are less power ups to achieve and more of the movie tickets.  I would rather have the power ups than the tickets.  This is why I am changing the rating I previously gave of 5 stars to 3.  Also, you should really have more of the Glenda versus the Wicked Witch challenges.

Great game but I really wish that daily rewards are better. It used to be you would get a crystal ball often, money and other things that to help with game, but lately it has been stuoid little rewards like two coins or one row clear. What happened to good rewards for players that come on every day and expect to get a little help in the game play

I love this game except for ONE big aggravation.   When you win extended life you don't get to choose when to use it.  It starts immediately and sometimes you've been playing to complete a sprint or another section and you CANT play another two hours.   That means you lose that extra time.   Today I've lost a 3 hour extra play and now I'm about to lose another 2 hour play.   Very Annoying!
description: Match 3 down THE YELLOW BRICK ROAD™ in a magical puzzle adventure game featuring DOROTHY™, the SCARECROW™, the TIN MAN™ and the COWARDLY LION™! Magic awaits in the EMERALD CITY™! Join the fun by solving puzzles and unlocking magical movie Moments! Learn fun facts and trivia, and see never-before-seen stills from The Wizard of Oz! Discover the rarest Moments to learn more about your favorite movie! Match your way to meet the wonderful Wizard of Oz in this amazing puzzle adventure! The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match Features: MATCH 3 IN THE LAND OF OZ!- Match 3 with new and unique gameplay based on the beloved Wizard of Oz movie and characters!- Matching brings you farther down the Yellow Brick Road with hundreds of exciting levels to overcome on your way!- Match even faster with bonuses and power-ups from GLINDA THE GOOD WITCH™! Use Dorothy’s RUBY SLIPPERS™, Munchkin Lollipops and the Tin Man’s Axe to solve puzzles!- Get help from your favorite movie characters by dropping their Medallions to the bottom of the board. They will appear and provide assistance on your current level! BATTLE AGAINST THE WICKED WITCH!- Match 3 or more gems against the WICKED WITCH OF THE WEST™ as you battle to reach The Wizard of Oz.- The fantasy comes to life as you take on the Wicked Witch in turn-based matching combat. ADVENTURE IN A MAGICAL WORLD!- Visit Munchkinland, the Haunted Forest, and more enchanting locations on your way from Kansas to the Emerald City!- Discover brand new levels and your favorite beloved characters in each new region you unlock.- Adventure with friends from Facebook, sharing gifts as you go. COLLECTIONS - MOVIE FACTS & MOMENTS!- Unlock and collect new Moments for an all-new perspective on classic scenes from the film!- Learn fun facts about your favorite movie! Collect each type of Reel containing Moments to complete Sets for big rewards and to unlock the full magical experience! DAILY REWARDS AND EVENTS!- Redeem Dorothy’s Daily Reward for a new bonus each day!- Win amazing prizes every day and join Happy Hour Events for even more!- Come and take part in weekly events, where you can face off against the Wizard of Oz himself, and other fun characters!   Download The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match and relive the magic of The Land of Oz today! Already enjoying The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match? Like us on Facebook to stay up-to-date on the latest content, newest levels, exciting contests, and more. https://www.facebook.com/TheWizardOfOzMagicMatch/ ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.• The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.• You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service, found at http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga’s Privacy Policy, found at  http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy. THE WIZARD OF OZ and all related characters and elements are trademarks of Warner Bros. and Turner Entertainment Co. (s16)

- Get help from your favorite movie characters by dropping their Medallions to the bottom of the board. They will appear and provide assistance on your current level!

BATTLE AGAINST THE WICKED WITCH!
- Match 3 or more gems against the WICKED WITCH OF THE WEST™ as you battle to reach The Wizard of Oz.
- The fantasy comes to life as you take on the Wicked Witch in turn-based matching combat.

ADVENTURE IN A MAGICAL WORLD!
- Visit Munchkinland, the Haunted Forest, and more enchanting locations on your way from Kansas to the Emerald City!
- Discover brand new levels and your favorite beloved characters in each new region you unlock.
- Adventure with friends from Facebook, sharing gifts as you go.

COLLECTIONS - MOVIE FACTS & MOMENTS!
- Unlock and collect new Moments for an all-new perspective on classic scenes from the film!
- Learn fun facts about your favorite movie! Collect each type of Reel containing Moments to complete Sets for big rewards and to unlock the full magical experience!

DAILY REWARDS AND EVENTS!
- Redeem Dorothy’s Daily Reward for a new bonus each day!
- Win amazing prizes every day and join Happy Hour Events for even more!
- Come and take part in weekly events, where you can face off against the Wizard of Oz himself, and other fun characters!

comments: It's my favourite of all the poker apps on the market so far. Two things I would change... Enable chat so you can say what you want. Also make buying chips less expensive (it's far too easy to go bust, then you can't play unless you spend lots of money on PLAY chips) sort it out please

Now I remember why I deleted this in the first place. Terrible game. Hardly ever win a hand. Too many so called 'players' keep raising so you lose more than you win. Deleting for the last time!

If you continuously win you lose continuously and if you have a lot of chips you'll lose the chips know why? This games is money hungry and wants you to buy stuff I had 25 million and now I have 13 million because the dealer got 20 2 times in a row mabey if you made the cards random and didint do what I complained about I would've gave this 5 stars.
There's a few small glitches but they are always keeping up and listening to players comments to make things better,  bravo! Really fun team challenges separates gop3 from all others.
This game is garbage the daily spin is garbage and the hands are not good ever. Unless your willing to spend money everyday don't bother. IT doesn't respond back to tech issues eith.

recentChanges: 20 new levels!
Chapter 110 Ancient Remains
Trix motioned to the heads poking in and out from the trees. "It's like they're watching us."
"They once lived in this forest's protector, a giant tree spirit," Jenni explained.
"Why can't just go back home and leave us alone?" Trix retorted.
They came upon a huge tree stump, riches spilling out of its hollowed center. "The bandits cut it down for the treasures that grew within," Jenni said.
"Oh no!" cried Trix. "We need to stop those bandits!"
summary: Win big with the best, most addictive, match 3 game. Play Genies & Gems Now!

comments: This game is really fun, I love everything about it, specially joining in a clan. But I wish there would be a chance to chat with each member not just smileys but as of now it's super great! Really fun to play, this is the longest time I've ever played such a game in my phone. Absolutely love it!

this game is good till about 8 hours in where your waiting days to build anything. Gems are really hard to come by so you have to be wary about how much stock u have. And there's no way to dispose of unwanted items in your warehouse (that I know of) but yeah, it's a catchy game

Pretty much a money pit. It's designed to frustrate you into spending money. Everything takes stupid amounts of resources to build or expand. The expansions are tiny. It becomes impossible to fill orders because they all want items you can't make because you cant build anything. Caravans usually ask for ridiculous amount of things and you have no storage room. Everything takes too long to make or regrow so even if you have room, the caravan times out. And the rewards for filling them is measly. It'll still take weeks to get enough to defeat monsters that block expansions. Don't download if youre looking for a fun game.

I liked this game, and have played it for months, until a few days ago when I noticed the "price" of buildings required to progress take a huge jump up!! I will gladly support a game I like by making purchases but I'm not about to spend my house payment just to progress IN A GAME!! Not cool, and makes me regret the money Ive spent so far. On to the next!!

Question why do I have to give 30 diamonds for one shield? And Everytime I expand my barn it on expand from 5-10 I need more room then that over then that.. I wake up out my sleep just to play this game. I need more space please and Thank u.
They deleted my whole account out of nowhere!  Everything gone. Don't waste your time. And please dont spend any money. Totally rip off!

comments: Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.
description: **#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.Over 200 Million Downloads! descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.

comments: Cannot get in touch with support. When Pennypop ran the game, they were very helpful and easy to get ahold of. Now I can't reach anyone and my account is in limbo (even after having been a dedicated player years ago). Be warned, it's not the game it was and until it steps up on customer service, I wouldn't put any money into it.

Tried reinstalling on a new device and it couldn't connect to facebook. Couldn't recognize my email (even though I get emails from them). Kept trying to get me to make a new account. I'm sorry, but when I play something off and on for roughly half a decade, then I'd like for the app to work so I can retrieve my account. Fix it, and I'll change my review because I really do love this game.

I'll give this game a higher rating only if the game support will release my epic monster, which is permanently locked for mission at the dig site. A glitch that they fail to do anything. No response, no support.

I'm revising my review.. I use to love this game. Now it's becoming more like a pain in my behind to even play. The game is not allowing me to do normal things that I'm suppose to be able to do. It's really making me angry!
I really love the hell out of this game.. Those haters who say its slow its not.. your phone is. your CPU is tacy as F plz don't blame the game..

Takes 2 mins to load then you have to press "try again" 20 times then wait for 2 mins and repeat everything 100x before it can load then just after you beat a boss you have to press try again 100x then it crashes. Best game ever.

comments: I've been playing this game for a long time now, and I have to say, I didn't have high hopes when I started. 30 minutes in, I couldn't stop and I wanted to play more. It's a different take on a Final Fantasy game, and it really does feel like a Dissidia game in RPG form. The bravery and HP system is very interesting, and I'm always looking forward for new characters and their few, but unique, special abilities. TL;DR Overall great game.

My name is auron I've been playing game since release and I have some concerns. For starters I have 999 all strength crystals. Why is there still events to get crystals? And wakka can use some ability to boost his buff dance. He barely procs.maybe instead of strength crystals you can have key events for summon materials... Love this game btw keep up the good work and please rework wakka!!!!

It's liked someone finally thought "hey,  maybe people just want a classic ff based game with out to much mobile game bull." I liking  it so far,  leveling pretty fast(well until  the pay wall hits) and the chance of me spend money on this 70 percent. But for real,  4 chapters in still  no Squall ya killing me.

Absolutely amazing. I can safely call this an actual game that you can play. There is no energy that stupidly limits play time, you can unlock all available characters by playing the game, and it actually FEELS like a true Final Fantasy game! I love this game and I am definitely going to spend money in the future to show my support for this amazing game.   However, since this game is fairly new, there isn't much to do. You definitely need to add more quests, more characters, more events, and PvP. Real-time PvP would be amazing. This is truely a spectacular game, and I highly recommend it for any Final Fantasy fan. Also, Cloud is available near the start of the game! Big thumbs up. Please don't screw around with energy Square Enix, please as it is a plague in the mobile gaming business.   EDIT: Please increase the level cap to 99 in the future please. Lv 50 cap doesn't feel right at all. Otherwise, awesome game.

The game is amazing!! However I am not able to play on my Samsung Galaxy 9+ after upgrading my phone and this is truly unfortunate. Are you guys working on a fix? Pleease let me know, will update to five star after...cause I mean at this point I cant play the game :(.

Got this game since launch, but after the 6th days, the game get pretty repetitive. My cload still at lvl 47 lol. The cutscene video could be better because I always skipped it. The casually walking at the start of a video make me wanna spam the skip button. I remember what intrigued me from the old ff cutscenes wasn't about the graphic, but their action pack scenes. RTK just launched (currently #1 on play store). I'll be playing that game instead for now.
description: ----------------------------------------◆ Game Info ◆----------------------------------------● A Dream Collaboration! Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!● Turn-Based Combat with a Twist! Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike! ● Assemble Your Party! Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way! ● Play with Friends! Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!----------------------------------------◆ Story ◆----------------------------------------Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes…What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world—a world they populated with warriors from other realms.These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help…
descriptionHTML:
----------------------------------------
◆ Game Info ◆
----------------------------------------
● A Dream Collaboration!
Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!

● Turn-Based Combat with a Twist!
Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike!

● Assemble Your Party!
Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way!

● Play with Friends!
Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!

----------------------------------------
◆ Story ◆
----------------------------------------
Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes…
What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.
Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world—a world they populated with warriors from other realms.
These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.
With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help…

comments: A well made app that's immersive, addictive, and the essence of the Kingdom Hearts franchise. The app is mission based and has a complex but easy to use medal system with rock-paper-scissors type of combat. You can join/make a party, or go solo. Money isn't an issue so long as you pace yourself. It gets better the more you play. There are optional event quests and a story, but don't fret if you can't get the app or just starting out; it's slow going. 735 quests.

Liking the cute art style but my god does this game take forever to download even with a low resolution. Has taken me two attempts and I'm doubtful that it's related to my broadband speed and connection (not sure if it's to do with my phone? But again, doubtful.) Would be great if this could be fixed somehow.

I freaking love this game! However I have a small complaint that is probably fixable. I was wondering for my lg g6 if you could expand the borders so the screen would fit. And if the screen is not able to get any bigger, I'm hoping you people can at least put a cool border around it instead of leaving it as a black bar. I know you people can make cool borders. Thanks for your attention!

Hey guys, huge fan of the kingdom hearts series and also the game in general. Though one thing I wish you could add is the option to link your data to your Google Play account as well as Facebook. Not a lot of us use Facebook so I wish there was more options to get your data back if you ever deleted the app. Otherwise, good game!

I love this game.  Strategy, adventure, and story (once you get far enough) are all great!  Although it is a little pay to win, and they keep coming out with new medals (attacks) that are infinitely better than your current ones.  This can get discurraging, because your hard work doesn't really mean much in the long run.    I played for 6 month when a friend got a single medal that made him more powerful than me on his 1st week playing.

[Edit: THANK YOU SO MUCH! I love that you all added a lower quality version this way I can play this game.] I like it and all, but when that very large download starts after the tutorial, it stops at 4/6 and restarts, even though my phone has enough room for it, I think. Please fix this, I really want to play it!

comments: I am only giving ABF a 3 right now. I have played ABF since the beginning of it's time. I feel as if the coin rewards are very slim in the higher leagues. I am a Diamond Star 4 and I feel as if the higher the level the higher the reward but, the rewards are all the same. When you work your way up you want to feel rewarded! If coin rewards increase in the higher levels so will my rating!!!!!

I would give it 5 stars, but they've changed a few things. It's now more difficult to earn coins for power-ups. So in order to win the tournaments, they've put people in the position of having to make purchases more often. Needless to say, I don't play as often anymore. I've also noticed that several of my friends don't play anymore either. Too bad, the game used to be a lot more fun.

Been playing this game for years. Loved it in the beginning.  Seems the lower I rate the game as they try to make easier for people that are not good.  the birds I throw are nearly useless a lot of times compared to playing the same game for a star 2 player I know. And now the game is crashing constantly. Wish I could sell the nearly 100,000 bird coins I have. Seems I won't need them.

Ok so when there is an issue that needs addressed, sometimes it take a couple of days for the tech people to get to it. But overall the game is awesome! This is the only game that I still play every day from the time I got a smart phone, which has been several years!

I love playing angry birds friends. I'm an adult woman and have played since they came out with the game. Scoring in first place many times. Recently there seems to be too much graphics and sometimes using plays from other games or other angry birds games. If people are submitting what they have thought out, please make sure it stays within original angry birds friends game. Some levels are too far out there.

I loved this game to keep in touch with a few friends but please take those stupid Dignity ads off... They do not close and always end up missing up my game. I have to close the game out and start all over. Loosing many power ups and coins in this tedius game making it more frustrating than fun.
description: All of the classic bird-flinging, pig-popping satisfaction of the original Angry Birds game, condensed into bite-sized, competitive tournaments – each with 6 new levels. Challenge your friends and the whole world for a top spot on the leaderboards and in the global leagues. Then, challenge other players one-on-one in the Star Cup to earn incredible rewards. Features:– 2 new tournaments every week. Challenge your friends – and the WORLD!– 6 new levels in every tournament. A new challenge every time!– Themed tournaments! Look out for special tournaments throughout the year.– Get high scores to climb in the leagues and earn rewards!– Awesome powerups! Pump up your birds for maximum damage.– Special slings! Up your damage to certain blocks – or all of them.CURRENT EVENT: HALLOWEENMonsters are invading Angry Birds Friends! descriptionHTML:
Bored with typical MMO Strategy game play? Play War and Magic! Every action counts for battle victory.

It’s time to show your strategic mind and capture the legendary honors in the most exciting REAL TIME MMO ACTION STRATEGY GAME! The well-designed battle system may challenge your strategic and tactical thinking. Command every action of your troops and every decision counts in the battles. Power is no longer the key to victory, but tactics and strategy.

Ally with worldwide players and fight for the highest throne in this magic world. Build an empire with advanced technologies and structures. Protect your homeland and fight against enemies with legendary heroes and powerful troops. Support each other within the alliance and fight for the honors together. Only the winners from the clash could be commemorated as legends!

FREE to play! Get it now!


Real Time Tactics and Strategy
- Improved game play for chessboard battlefield – every strategic action counts!
- Strategically mix and match various heroes and soldiers for powerful troops.

Build an Empire
- Forge powerful equipment, level up your structures and technologies for greater power.
- Real time resource management – maximize every bit of your resources and grow as fast as possible!
- Look out for the enemies! Improve your defense ability and never let them succeed in plundering.
- Participate in various daily competitions which could strengthen your empire power.

Trigger an Online World War
- Released worldwide in 8 languages. You could ALLY or FIGHT with other players worldwide in real time.
- Attack your enemies and colonize the land! Also, be careful about improving your defense ability.
- United we stand, divided we fall! Share troops and resources with alliance members to support and strengthen each other. Remember, you are not alone!
- Battle for the throne! Conquer and defend the three world cities, struggling for the crown of the King.

Explore the Magic World
- 8 legendary heroes and 17 types of soldiers with unique skills and spells for you to choose from.
- Seek exotic monsters in the extensive world map and captive them for your troops.
- Visit relics covered under the mist and grab the treasures.

Need helps?

Do yourself a favor and Invest your time in another game.

description: Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO’s most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:• Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers• Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower• Breed pigs and sell them for profit• Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool• New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood• Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice• New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment• Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber• Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth
descriptionHTML:
Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!

You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO’s most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.

With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!

Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:

• Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers
• Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower
• Breed pigs and sell them for profit
• Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool
• New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood
• Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice
• New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment
• Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber
• Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth
